Sentencas: This research is focused on the effect of supplying solid oxide fuel cells with different graphite and carbon black powders on the cells' efficiency.
Titulo: Effect of structural properties of carbon-based fuels on efficiency of direct carbon fuel cells

Sentencas: Before being tested in the fuel cell, the structures of carbon-based fuels were characterized by X-ray diffraction analysis, Raman spectroscopy, scanning electron microscopy, and thermal analysis method (DTA/TG).
Titulo: Effect of structural properties of carbon-based fuels on efficiency of direct carbon fuel cells

Sentencas: Total electrical conductivity measurements were also carried out for carbon samples.
Titulo: Effect of structural properties of carbon-based fuels on efficiency of direct carbon fuel cells

Sentencas: The relation between the structure and morphology of solid particles and their performance in direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells (DC-SOFC) was presented and discussed.
Titulo: Effect of structural properties of carbon-based fuels on efficiency of direct carbon fuel cells

Sentencas: It was found that structurally disordered carbon-based materials are the most promising fuels for oxidation in DC-SOFCs.
Titulo: Effect of structural properties of carbon-based fuels on efficiency of direct carbon fuel cells
